name: Creative Mood
content: Be creative and think outside the box. Use vivid language and metaphors.

name: Precise Mood
content: Be exact and factual. Stick to the requirements without deviation.

name: Professional Tone
content: Maintain a professional, business-appropriate tone throughout.

name: Casual Tone
content: Use a friendly, conversational and approachable tone.

name: Technical Focus
content: Focus on technical details, specifications, and implementation aspects.

name: User-Friendly Focus
content: Prioritize clarity and accessibility for non-technical users.
